name: quasar-contact-app
description: Combined landing page, Angular chat frontend, and Node.js backend

scripts.dev: npm run copy && cd backend && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run copy && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && echo 'DEBUG: NG_APP_API_URL=' $NG_APP_API_URL && echo 'DEBUG: NG_APP_WS_URL=' $NG_APP_WS_URL && echo 'DEBUG: NODE_ENV=' $NODE_ENV && npx ng build --configuration production
scripts.copy: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && if [ -d 'frontend/dist/browser' ]; then cp -r frontend/dist/browser/* dist/; elif [ -d 'frontend/dist' ]; then cp -r frontend/dist/* dist/; else echo 'No frontend dist found'; fi
scripts.full: npm run clean && npm run build:frontend && npm run copy && npm run build:backend && npm start
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/ && rm -rf frontend/dist/ && rm -rf backend/dist/

author: art2url
